content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: RecheckCertificateVerification path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/delivery/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/certificates/{certificate_id}/recheck content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name certificateid
desc a certificate id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum recheck certificate verification
desc recheck a certificates verification details while its being issued this applies to stackpaths free certificates
responses
title: 23_SSL_RecheckCertificateVerification_140.json
